document.description: Now you can Order Online from Two Guys! Click on the ORDER NOW button and Order for Pick-up or Delivery.
document.body:
Now you can Order Online from Two Guys!
Click on the ORDER NOW button and Order for Pick-up or Delivery .

Home
TWo Guys From italy
Located conveniently in Glendale, we offer delicious, authentic Italian foods prepared by our experienced chefs. We also offer catering orders and free delivery on a minimum purchase of $10.00.
ORDER NOW!!!
Ph: (818) 240-0020
Fax: (818) 240-0972
HOURS

Thursday-Saturday 11:00 am - 11:00 pm

TWO GUYS FROM ITALY iPHONE APP!
Dowload the App Today!
Once App is Downloaded Enter 8182400020 to ACTIVATE.
